cmp: 申 ((surname)/3-5 p.m./9th earthly branch/extend/to state/to explain)
mng: free, unimpeded, smooth, at ease, free from worry, fluent

exm.mng: free, unimpeded, smooth, at ease, free from worry, fluent
unrestrained, cheerful lack of inhibition, esp. for drinking or sleeping, to drink with abandon
unimpeded, free-flowing, straight path, unclogged, move without obstruction
lit. fluently saying all one wants (idiom); to preach freely on one's favorite topic, to hold forth to one's heart's content
flowing (of speech, writing), fluent, smooth and easy
to chat, a long talk, verbose, to talk freely to one's heart's content
to sell well, best seller, chart-topping
orderly and logical (of writing), luxuriant, flourishing, prosperous
abundant and fluent, affluent and smooth
